Package org.zone.region.flag

Interface Flag

All Known Subinterfaces:
Flag.AffectsPlayer, Flag.Enabled, Flag.GroupKeyed, Flag.TaggedFlag, Flag.ValueStore
All Known Implementing Classes:
BlockBreakFlag, BlockPlaceFlag, DoorInteractionFlag, EcoFlag, EditingFlag, EntityDamagePlayerFlag, GreetingsFlag, ItemFrameInteractFlag, LeavingFlag, MembersFlag, PlayerFallDamageFlag, PreventMonsterFlag, PreventPlayersFlag, TagsFlag
public interface Flag
A modifier for a Zone. This is designed to hold data or modify the zone in one way or another

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static interface 
    Flag.AffectsPlayer
    If the flag affects players then it should implement this
    static interface 
    Flag.Enabled
    If the flag can be enabled/disabled, then it should implement this to help other plugins to understand your flag
    static interface 
    Flag.GroupKeyed
    If the flag has a group key override, then it should implement this to assist other plugins attempting to understand

    • save

      serializes this flag to the provided ConfigurationNode
      Type Parameters:
      T - The class of this flag

      Throws:
      IOException - if there is a issue saving

    • findAttachedZone

      @NotNull default @NotNull Optional<Zone> findAttachedZone()
      Finds the zone that this flag belongs to. If another way to find the zone is possible, then please use that as this checks every zone until found
      Returns:
      The attached zone, if Optional.empty() then no active zone has this flag
